titles.title: Legislative Reports on Estimates of Expenses and Impacts on Revenues of Bills and Laws Under PROMESA Act
Legislative Reports on Estimates of Expenses and Impacts on Revenues of Bills and Laws Under PROMESA Act
To amend PROMESA to authorize the legislature and require the Oversight Board to take into consideration reports prepared by the relevant Budget Office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
